items.title: “Jugaremos contra el país anfitrión y ante unos 80.000 aficionados que lo apoyarán con mucha fuerza, pero necesitamos creer en nosotros mismos, trabajar duro y tomarnos las cosas con la misma seriedad que hasta ahora”

“You only need a safeguard if you don’t have adequate domestic capacity. For Kenya, the first safeguards were put in place over 24 years ago to help the country build sufficient domestic capacity to compete on the same footing with the other Comesa countries. The last extension was granted in November 2023, and that was on condition that there would be no further request for extension of the safeguards. And, from where we sit, we do not need it,”

“We have respect for Senegal, they are a big footballing country in Africa, they are the former champions, but we are ready. My players will need to prove to me, and to all Sudanese people here and back home, that they deserve to do better than where we are. I think Senegal are the favourites, but I am sure we will give them a very good game,”
“Ha habido propaganda abierta de la homosexualidad y las minorías sexuales en el mundo del cine en años recientes, y he estado preocupado por esto durante largo tiempo”
„Es handelt sich um eine der schlimmsten Tragödien, die es in unserem Land jemals gab“
